original_text: And the Redeemer shall come to Zion, and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 구속자가 시온에 임하며 야곱의 자손 가운데에서 죄과를 떠나는 자에게 임하리라

sentences.original_text: And the Redeemer shall come to Zion
and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob
